summary:
Nocturnal\'s Accoutrements

I added some accessories to enhance Armored Nocturnal Robes, I sure hope you like them.

The gear is available @ Lucan\'s Trading Post in Riverwood.

It is also craft-able under the Daedric category, upgrade-able at the workbench & enchantable.
I made a hood, boots & gauntlets and they do not replace anything.
li
descriptionHtml:
[b]Some new gear is available for sale at the Riverwood Trading Post![/b]

[b]>>26/01/12<< New Inventory Alert ... Master Robe Armored Variant Available Now! This will not replace anything in the game.[/b]

I made these items using SkyEdit ... I\'m not a texture artist so I had to use what was available to me within the game ... I did not replace anything ... I just made copies then edited them to my satisfaction... I tried to pick some stuff that no other modder used yet & that is kinda hard to do.

I did come up with some gear that I thought worked well together, this project took me about an hour to work out & another 3 hours to refine.

I hope you enjoy it!

Installation is just drop it in your data folder and activate
author: alienzerox

files.changelogHtml:
added an armored variant of the master mage robes
added recipes to craft the armored mage robe @ the forge under the daedric category
added recipes to improve the armored mage robe @ the workbench
arranged the armored mage robe to be available for sale @ Lucan\'s Trading Post in Riverwood
